name: Tumblr - Rainbow Dashboard
description: A Rainbow Dash background for Tumblr, with some pretty post colour modifications for even more rainbowyness.
additional_info:
2012-02-18: v1.0 - Initial release
2013-04-18: v2.0 - Added coloured borders for different types of post, and improved background for smaller screens.
2013-04-19: v2.1 - More colour-coding

(Unfortunately, I can't seem to find the original source of the background, even with Tineye's help. If anybody knows, be sure to tell me.)

discussions.name: Rainbow Dash is way too low
